resources.string:
Quick Maths is quick arithmetic game 
 
 There are 4 levels:
 	 Level 1: Addition from 1 - 10
 	 Level 2: Addition from 1 - 10 
 									Subtraction from 1 - 10 
 	 Level 3: Addition from 1 - 50
 									Subtraction from 1 - 50
 									1 - 5 times tables
 	 Level 4: Addition from 1 - 50
 									Subtraction from 1 - 50 
 									1 - 10 times tables
 									Integer division from 1 - 50
 
 
 Answer the question by typing on the number pad displayed and pressing enter. 
 
 Press the C button or shake the device to clear an existing answer 
 
 Your ten best scores per level will automatically be saved into the High Scores.
